mapper.select: SELECT A.seq, iuser AS writerIuser, B.pic AS writerPic, A.msg, A.created_at AS createdAt FROM t_dm_msg A JOIN t_user B USING (iuser) WHERE A.idm = #{idm} ORDER BY A.seq DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT A.idm, A.last_msg AS lastMsg, A.last_msg_at AS lastMsgAt, D.iuser , D.nm AS otherPersonNm, D.pic AS otherPersonPic FROM t_dm A JOIN t_dm_user B ON A.idm = B.idm JOIN t_dm_user C ON B.idm = C.idm JOIN t_user D ON C.iuser = D.iuser WHERE B.iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND C.iuser != #{loginedIuser} ORDER BY B.last_msg DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
